author: Warhammer
description:
Arty Papageorgiou, one of the screenwriters for The Lord of the Rings™: The War of the Rohirrim™, sits down to chat about the movie, working with Games Workshop, and his love of the Middle-earth™ Strategy Battle Game.

title: The Lord of the Rings™: The War of the Rohirrim™ – Exclusive Interview

author: Warhammer
description:
Hopefully, you’ll never need the ‘skills’ of the Skaven, but if you do find yourself looking behind your back too many times, then the Services of a Stormvermin might be up your alley! 

Today Jake will show you how to paint your hired goon with ten paints, ready for the battlefield!
Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Contrast:
Baal Red
Volupus Pink

Base:
Catachan Flesh
Rakarth Flesh
XV-88

Layer: 
Evil Sunz Scarlet
Krieg Khaki
Ogryn Camo
Stormhost Silver

Shade:
Agrax Earthshade

Tools:
M Layer
M shade
If you're new to painting, our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

title: How To Paint: Skaven Stormvermin | Intermediate | Warhammer: Age Of Sigmar
